item.title: Adding overhead talking to an npc [562]
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

How do I have an NPC automatically say stuff over their head. I do not know what to search for.

I do know it is easy to find and add but I can’t manage to find it or know the code for it.

I don’t want force chat, is it overhead?

} if(npc.getId() == 2253) { npc.getUpdateFlags().setForceTextUpdateRequired(true); npc.forceChat("ProJeccT is a sexy beast... give him that bitch a blow job..."); }

Read full topic
